lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, you had a few words?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's Rocket and Poot and everybody's favorite Canadian tough-guy, Walford Rains. Snicket! Yeah. And you solve puzzles and it's really addictive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're like the only show that a sponsor's going to let us get away with botching their product.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the names of the characters, I'm pretty sure.

lines.text: I love the team of Professor Triple X and Dr. Strange.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "TALKS" as in Talks Machina, and that gives you 30 days free trial on Alpha, so if you're a good gamer like Sam is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know that those things stack, so you can use your free subscription from Amazon Prime, and then use another 30 days, and then it's only 30 more days before your checks expire and then they're not good anymore.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think our audience gets the joke. The camera's laughing.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Before it was the mansion, it was Columbia House.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! You should also go watch Talks Machina, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have silly discussions, answer community questions, and generally just hang out and make fools of ourselves for your entertainment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bring handshakes and we'll touch them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's nothing new this week, but there's all the stuff that I talked about last week, like socks and hoodies and hats and bracelets and pens--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we have Critical Role socks, which apparently they've done really good, we've already sold half, and people are already super excited for us to have character-driven socks.

lines.text: They're really comfy, but then I took them off and my cats found them and now they will not give them back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't give them to your cats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is really true, they've taken them and they're not giving them back.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm hoping for that in the store.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're going to smell like balsamic vinaigrette or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So mark it on your calendar. April 29th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think that's it, if anyone has anything else they want to announce?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The chivalrous knight in that game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, you can see me tomorrow morning at 9AM Pacific Time.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And just paint him and put things on and change armors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, picking up where we left off from my esteemed panel of extremely mature--

lines.text: Do we have Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just don't know how long it lasts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flying up on the broom, all that.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. So yeah, roll again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've done it before and we can do it again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's be honest, she fucking knows we're here.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: This was my one 20 of the night, folks, everyone else--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It just means you won't die first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just going home. We can start again with a real job. I'm done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, the twins are rolling too? I should've taken that 20 for myself, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have nothing more to discuss." Turns another page of the book and continues facing away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I look at the ceiling, every other part of this room except for where she is, to see if she's also somewhere else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be just this figure in this room amongst the rotting corpse of Thordak and the two eggs tossed to the side.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: I'm just trying to draw a bead on whatever's in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No celestials, no fiends, no undead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did the party, as they were clomping along, did they catch up with us at all, or are they still that far back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The actual chasm ends over on this side here, and this is the entranceway with the fountain you had discovered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody should roll off to the left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can she be right in the middle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about as close to middle as she can get right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we all move up a little bit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to peel off a little bit to the left--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just got yelled at in my earpiece, so I will not--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike's like, "Just a fucking second! "Let me cast Beacon of Hope!"

lines.text: What's the range on Beacon of Hope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody is currently under the effect of Beacon of Hope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which means that you are hopeful and vital.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it a perpetual radius of her, or does it affect each person at the time of casting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It affects everybody at the time of casting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For the duration, each target has advantage on wisdom saving throws and death saving throws, and regains the maximum number of hit points when healed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So keep tabs on maximum healing and wisdom saves and death saves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is she really there, or is that an illusion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I tell if it's really an illusion, or does it look like she's really there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I couldn't sense her before when she was in her human form, so I'm assuming I can't sense her now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like she's got something masking her, that whole thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did the dragon-sense right before we came down this hallway and I sensed three dragons down here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In the time it's taken you guys to deliberate and discuss this, and the long awkward pause that's transpired after Raishan said the previous thing she did, her voice picks up once again and says, "Whereabouts is your brass pet?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth steps forward a little bit towards the twins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy and Grog are going to roll off to the left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep going until I'm on line-of-sight with the red eggs against the back wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that far, not even that far, like there. Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to move across from my sister and move forward up to-- I can't tell from the overview, but a little bit of rock's right there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth just says, "Did you find what you were looking for?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: disease you were looking for? Your curse?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think you can resist the same type of madman mentality that Thordak fell victim to when you anchor yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is of no use to me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While that conversation's going on, I want to bamf Trinket out and send him around the other way.

lines.text: Come on, Trinket! You're so quiet-- ooh! Trinket rolls a 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well maybe she doesn't know Trinket's here.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: I'll move up a little bit, too.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Enough so that hopefully I can get as many people within ten feet as possible, and ideally within 30 feet, if I need to rush and attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could either move forward with them, or if you wish to push forward on your own, you are currently not visible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura feels the lack of magical force on this side, is going to follow up behind you guys as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even with her hood up, she gives you a glance like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, of course I am, that's part of the reason.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll inch up a little, still hiding behind those outcroppings there, and then I'm going to call out the dog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, nice! Pike's going to walk to the middle, where she's in between the two parties.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just say, "Good doggy!" Right? And I throw the figurine.

lines.text: Like Reginald or something? What was his name?

lines.text: You said-- it was very cryptic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did write it down at one point in time, but I'm not going to look for it right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll use this badger for the time being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I couldn't find an actual dog figure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got a mastiff. I'll donate it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Pike wants to walk in between the two parties, so hiding behind that wall outcropping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Decline, and you choose your resting place here, "away from your loved ones, to be forgotten "and join the undying dregs of a long-passed madman's fancy."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth steps forward again, a little bit more, and says--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want to, I just, okay." I want to keep walking up to her as much as I can.

lines.text: So you step out of the shadows.

lines.text: Shit, I've got to follow-- if I see her moving-- I can't. I'm not good with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima sneaks up behind you, Trinket follows up behind there, and Allura stays just to one side there.

lines.text: "You know, Raishan, you've taught me a lot about myself, these past few weeks; arguably more than I've learned about myself my entire years of living."

lines.text: "Good. I'm glad I could enlighten and inspire in these final moments."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see I have your attention after all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what is it? You've come here to speak on your enlightenment and die? "Or do we wish to maintain the agreement we had, "go our own separate ways--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We knew that from the beginning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do more to your own people than I've done in an entire lifetime.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So we shall call your foolishness kismet."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess it's a matter of who wins, now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm giving you one last shot.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Surrender, and if you choose not to, at least we can go forward in our consciences and know that we gave you a choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lucky green, lucky green, come on!

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: The eggs have't taken a turn yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And that is-- oh, that's not that good. Is 14.

lines.text: I've never killed an egg before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that egg there I will mark as currently--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Does that end your turn?

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: What else would you like to do with your turn?

lines.text: Fuck. I think I'm going to save-- I'm going to back up against the wall, just straight back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Because I feel very uncomfortable with the situation and I'm going to save my attack for if Thordak moves, if anything moves at all, I'm going to wait to attack it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still on this back wall here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a shot with Bad News at the remaining egg.

lines.text: The bullet ricochets off the outside of the hardened eggshell and just (ricochet sound).

lines.text: You threw them all simultaneously at a single egg.

lines.text: Did you add ten to yours just now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, regular shot, because fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it goes splattering to the side of it, you can watch as what looks to be some sort of a very, very young primordial dragon like the ones that you had yanked out of the eggs before that was trying to pull its way out of the egg, slumps lifelessly over the side of the egg you destroyed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't suppose I have time to run a weird perception check, do I? Really quickly? Do I have a moment for a perception check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've used all your action and your bonus action...

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, just wanted to have my moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, that would've been so smart, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a moment of horror like, oh god, that's dragon-sized. Okay, cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could've just not rolled high enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of Percy's turn, the human figure across the way with the dark green hair gives a deep bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then vanishes from the field.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dog turns around and faces this direction and starts barking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope she attacks-- well no, I hope we get to attack her soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be the end of Raishan's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all of a sudden hear the mastiff barking over and over again in this direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see, did I-- oh god, I can't, it's not my turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Did my hair go whoosh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's kind of always doing that a little bit, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's that near me back there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Vex I will inspire with a quick limerick.

lines.text: You can take your d12 inspiration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. I'm going to step forward as much as I can towards the sound I heard and blow my horn of fog just everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't you put that drug pipe down for like five seconds?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't take it away from me, man!

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: This is going to settle a lot of bets on who vapes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no vision beyond the outside of it, right where you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if something comes through, it will disturb the fog, correct?

lines.text: Congratulations, we can play Laser Tag now.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: I rage and-- I would like to rage.

lines.text: With my 50 feet of speed, can I try to make it to Thordak's corpse? See how far I get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, yes, get it. Get it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get right up to it, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, cool. Can I take-- I found out that the hammer, the dwarven thrower, is a versatile weapon.

lines.text: Yeah, you can hold it with two hands if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With two hands, can I take a shot at his big stupid cranium?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to squash the watermelon.

lines.text: You didn't need it, but go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Okay. Come on, crit on the dead skull-- natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Oh, the second egg did get destroyed.

lines.text: But you're welcome to, if you'd like.

lines.text: There's potentially corpses in those cages that could be something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm focused on the egg, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, how far can you leap?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I have to make a DC 16 athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is an unmoving baby dragon corpse that is-- you've got a date with your hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I touch down, may I throw the dwarven hammer at baby egg corpse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All your attacks are reckless, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Do it again! No, not quite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But this is just a d8 because it's one-handed, right?

lines.text: Plus an additional d8 because you threw it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if we're going to kill Raishan, but we smoked those eggs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's part of the enchantment of the hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The currently-lifeless limp corpse of this nearly-hatched primordial dragon-- whatever this new entity was through the merger of the power of the soul anchor in the fire elemental plane and Thordak, the ancient red dragon, this remaining dragonkin-- is turned into red oatmeal against the table and the stone wall behind it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No? We're not worried about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hall looks dangerous right where he is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's two magical columns right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those aren't even there at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you feel a strange, warm sensation in your chest--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also at the end of your turn, Grog, or as soon as your turn ends, you hear this (undead inhale) strange sucking breath-like sound.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: In the Hindu faith, you would welcome it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: let's see, for Kima she can do up to-- she's going to give you 30 hit points.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends Kima's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura has to make a death saving throw.

lines.text: Pike I need to make roll a death saving throw.

lines.text: Okay. Okay. Nobody else just willy-nilly make some rolls, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: All righty. Is that the end of your turn, Keyleth? Are you going to move forward?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You tried to kill her, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In this state, she's just going to mount you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get to make your attack as she comes into range, flying past for you.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Oh, okay. That's all I need, just a chance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not like this. Not like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like seriously, Sam has stacked up his binder, he's closed everything like he's getting ready to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is sad. This is sad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is the rest of the day for him, there's nowhere to go for-- yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just put your head down on the desk, student.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: 20, which is not going to make it, I'm guessing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A total of twenty? No, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (tearfully) I just rolled bad, I'm sorry.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Mother. Fucker. I miss with both. Got no juice to throw on it either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First swing just goes wide, the second one hits the side, but you haven't hit hard ancient dragon hide before, and it scrapes across the outside with no noticeable damage and a little seed of fear wells in your heart once more.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Yep, that's okay. I got to use these actions that were going to be wasted anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As Raishan slams down onto the ground--

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Was she holding action alongside me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she cast a spell to heal you last turn as a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan is going to unleash upon you, Percy, who has avoided the Meteor Swarm, who has shot her in the face, and right now in her feral state is just focused on what's closest and angry at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First strike, that is a 26 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh Jesus, how is this happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the bite. That is 17 plus eight... 25 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you fall to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you lose a death save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. Oh, is that lose a death save? I was only a few feet up, it wasn't like a-- it wasn't-- okay. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were just a few feet up? As opposed to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, an eight-foot drop on your head is pretty bad.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: You could leave him with one foot stuck to the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to be Shorthalt and de Rolo in heaven, just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's so cute that you think either of us are going to heaven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to angrily take a claw attack at your body, which hits, a critical, that's two death saving throws--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the bite knocks you to the ground, the claw slams down onto your torso, and just tears out the side of your body, your entrails scattered across the stone floor--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kerrek, you and Kima both there watch this happen as Percy is now partially spread across the stone immediately to the right of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The blood is in fact blue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Grog would like to get up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does that take for me to do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Half my movement. Can I use the rest of my movement to run towards dragon-dick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. That's as far as you can get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the boots of feral leaping to leap even further.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute, did she even roll to break her Grasping Vine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasping Vine doesn't keep her restrained, it just grabs somebody and pulls them there, it's meant to move things--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean, that's still cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I leap through her chest. Boom!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. So I have my three attacks, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You're not in melee, you didn't quite get far enough to get--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Imma have to throw 'em. Reckless, not negated because I can see her now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second one I'll make reckless and great weapon master.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. No, I can't do great weapon master because it's one-handed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no, well, it's thrown, you can only do it with melee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Kima have Revivify, do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you have two of them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe, she might. Are you guys out of Revivifies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Pike has lots more spells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In a minute. That's a long time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think the sooner you do it, the easier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt does get weird about the minute rule, that is also funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he's like, come on, Percy, we've got red and green grapes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, the ultimate punishment for Scanlan is he would show up as a spectral servant in somebody else's mansion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, the last one I rolled a one on the damage, I reroll ones or twos with that first thing of fighter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want what? Oh. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I don't remember what the number was, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The weapon... a melee weapon you're wielding with two hands, which as you're throwing it, you're not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So no. All right, got it. That ends Grog's turn. Kerrek, you're up.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Oh please, please just let me, all I want to do is stick at least one on this god damned dragon.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: So I'm going to burn my second-level spell for Smite and she is not anything that is specifically affected by Doomhammer here? She's not undead technically or--

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Just... just bad. So that's ten... 18... one more. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Literally had seven hit points left. As far as my math goes, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't fucking believe-- I can't fucking believe that happened!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kerrek just like leveled up to like...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The feral beast there, tearing the innards out of Percy on the ground, Grog slamming into it, just seemingly bashing against the world, watching everyone drop around you like flies, your warhammer in hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take a break, and we're going to take a little time to take in the aftermath of this moment before we finish tonight's episode. So we'll be back here in a few minutes, we're going to go ahead and use the restroom. We'll see you guys here shortly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima walks over and grabs your shoulder and tightly squeezes it, going, "You did what had to be done. Thank you."

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: I mean, I've been around, I can't help him, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura shouts out to her on the side.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: I get down there, and I'm doing, I'm doing useless combat triage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start stumbling over towards Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Percy?" I go running around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys both kind of run, Keyleth a bit behind, Vex, you turn and you see Raishan's corpse just piled, and then on the ground you see Kerrek slowly and methodically, almost staring off into a memory, trying to gather a bit of Percival's scattered innards from the side torn open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike comes running around the corner. "Oh, God." And she runs up real fast and begins gathering her Revivify spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pick him up. I start walking towards Grog with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did either of you guys want to roll for Pike's Revivify?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want Matt to do this, so that there's no--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. Is that a five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus what? It's not going to work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival has died... how many times?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think just once for him, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It works. It works. It's just enough. It's just enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, how many times has he died?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taliesin, how many times have you died?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the necklace count, or does the necklace not count?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once. As far as I can remember.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 'Cause the necklace just instantly bamfed him back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, similar to the effect earlier.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: I'm probably going to be trying to use it even though I know better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (breathes) And breath comes back to Percival's body. You come to consciousness. Barely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Welcome back. Don't look down, you're a bloody mess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to pass out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take off running for Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you turn around the corner--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got him in my arms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima and Allura are rushing up to you now as well. "Is he--" And you turn the corner, Grog, and you see Vax holding the still body of Scanlan, just dangling out of his arms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. No. No! Fix him! FIX HIM!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just start to rock him like a child.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to take him home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to get him out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we got all these people with magic, you've all got magic spells, you just brought him back. Fix him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike looks at Kima. "Can you do anything?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I-- look, I have a certain skillset, and it's not this kind of skillset, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax, the Raven Queen. You can talk to her, right? Vax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, what do we need? Do we need, like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. We have to get him out of here, because this place sucks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to take him somewhere. To the temple. And we need to find his daughter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Um, okay. Question. Oh, you didn't kill anything, did you, Vex? There's no, like Fenthras-trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura says, "I do have a teleport spell I can utilize. Gather everyone around."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to leave it here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, you're very funny, but this is not very funny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm coming back here to dissect that monster once we're done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fair. Okay, let's save our friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Let's all of us gather our hands together." She puts her hands out, Kima takes one side, and you all form a circle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am lying down to do this, but yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She closes her eyes. She begins the incantation under her breath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief flux of arcane energy, and then it fades and you all remain in place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, something is-- something is barring my--

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: It's this place. The dragon said that there were features to this place.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Kerrek has no affect in his voice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have to get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Up and out. Up and out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can she see if it's coming from anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there is just a general magical presence, like a faint magical energy everywhere in here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run over to inspect it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What hit points am I at right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. The door looks like-- the door doesn't look like it's particularly intricate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's locked or chained by something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax, can you check for traps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to third-level Cure Wounds you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What am I at right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm going to Cure Wounds on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I head over to where Keyleth is and start looking for traps.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Can I Lay on Hands with him once he's back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use my last Luck of the day.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: So I can give you-- I'll give you 30.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just used my last Luck of the day and I got two ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door seems, not trapped, but it appears to be chained or locked from the other side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck that shit. Titanstone Knuckles. I'm going through the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give him back, give him back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's not trapped, I checked it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. (punching sounds) You start slamming your fists against the door, and as it splinters and then breaks inward, and then outward, and rocks just start tumbling outward, where once was the door in this vicinity here now appears to be a cave-in on the opposite side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Augh. I do my Stone Shape and I just punch the walls and try and blast a hole through the fallen rubble with Stone Shape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that whatever chamber was beyond this room--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to walk out of here. There's no other way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike looks at the book that's emanating magic. Does it look like it's an evil book at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has ancient brass inlays, and it is locked shut on one side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike's going to take off her scarf and throw it over it and try to cover it and wrap it up in cloth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And ask Grog to put it in the bag of holding and wonder if that'll make the magic go away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also just going to grab Grog really quickly and just scrape as much stuff off the shelves into the bags because we need to know what this shit is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that all seems to go in fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just to see if any reaction happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The staff disengages and falls to the ground, clattering against the stone, seeming that the remainder of the disease completed its cycle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just say, "That was for Scanlan from the Ashari. Bitch."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything to know what they were. But I don't want to take the whole thing, I don't want to leave anything. We're going to burn it. We're going to burn it all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take the gate stone and put it back.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Knock out these pillars, it'll cave this whole thing in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still want to burn it, but yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's not walk around this place anymore.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: No no no, wait wait wait, with constitution I get...

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Plus seven. 15. 18. I probably should've been making some of these saving throws by adding the right numbers to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all look over suddenly as Kerrek is just locked in place, all the muscles pulled into this tense moment, just screaming in place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is he grabbing onto? Is he grabbing onto something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing. He just walked toward one of the pillars--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my Rope of Entanglement and grab him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are purely a primal entity that is suffering right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk over, I'm going to try--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I kneel down and try Lay on Hands on him, because it can cure multiple diseases and cure poisons with a single use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you spend five of your hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura immediately looks over and is going to attempt to dispel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your breath begins to regulate--

lines.name: ALLURA
lines.text: Just do not touch that for the next ten minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to quickly search Scanlan's body for his wand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to shoot some Fireballs in here when we're on our way out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to burn it to the ground?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn it to the fucking ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can help you with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we leave, we help burn this motherfucker to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue back out to the edge of the chasm where the bridge is currently--

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: The bridge got snapped, didn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can ferry back and forth on the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, ferry on the carpet and the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get across without issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike casts Light on her mace so that it's a nicely lit thing, it's not all creepy and dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way across, heading back towards the spiral staircase upwards. The glyph--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you make your way up into the next chamber, you begin to hear cackling laughter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are these the fucking ghostrider skulls again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear (cackling) from ahead, and you see a little bit of a light source begin to appear from the iron door room that you guys had your first encounter with--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they all just like right down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just see the glow as they're descending down a grade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we're kind of in a hallway, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then Pike's going to use her-- Yeah, she's going to use Turn Undead on those motherfuckers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll just double-check here, because it's pretty close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 30 feet near you. So she can wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they can shoot Fireballs, so maybe that's not smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll actually say, the second that we see them, I'm just going to empty the wand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, will they just be fine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to just shoot them with arrows and try to get them from far away, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you guys are holding your action for when they come into range, essentially.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Is this like a straight tunnel, a straight featureless tunnel heading towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are heading back up the pathway, and you see them now coming in your direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I just unload on them, I suppose?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it all four of them?

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: We just can't clump like we were before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got a Sunbeam ready to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yours has a probably good range on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 60 foot. But I want to get them in a line.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got 120 feet on my bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys, hearing the cackling and seeing the glow coming, you hold your actions. You're holding your bow, you're holding a Sunbeam, you're holding your attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to line them up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two lines of two, essentially. So.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They just grow back? Like, we shattered two of 'em.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling there's a bunch of these guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Keyleth. Sunbeam can only affect two of them. So they get their saving throw, right? Roll 8d6, if you could. They... (laughs) they do not make their saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right. Five, six, need two more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Got you. All right. Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try doing a sharpshooter piercing shot on another round of them with the Pepperbox. Sharpshooter piercing shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike's going to do Sacred Flame on them, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not bad. So that's-- the first shot is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 27 points of damage, with five points of psychic damage for the first shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They appear-- the blasts of the bullets don't seem to be doing as much damage as other forms of attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, but it's hitting both of them in a row.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next shot is-- ha! Is 28 points of damage with four points of psychic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this is the ones she damaged with the Sunbeam?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of them immediately just scatter into dust and bone. The two on the other side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 points of damage with one point of psychic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's my contribution to the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They have to do a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. So one of them takes 22 damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do the one that Percy just hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, there's four of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two are down, the other two are damaged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool, well, she chooses one. And then I'm going to, as Vex, shoot arrows at them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't hit because the world hates me tonight. And that one hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura, who is frustrated and understanding what their resistances are, she's going to go ahead and cast a high-level Magic Missile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That one just explodes and scatters, so now there is one left that is just partially damaged from Percival.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Then I leave the ring of invisibility off, and I just charge.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: I'm heading toward them, because if they hit me and I'm far enough away, it won't hit the whole group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you go rushing in, that triggers them-- or the one that's remaining to go ahead, and it's going to fire two Fire Rays at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 13 points of fire damage on one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And seven points of fire damage on the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both blast him in the shoulder, one hits him in the side of the knee and thigh, but Kerrek keeps running forward. You can go ahead and make your attacks if you want.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: And-- actually, that's way better than 19, I'm counting dumb. This is 18.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Okay. So for the first one, I'm going to burn one for Divine Smite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 for both hits? That's the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so do the second hit now.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: And that doesn't do it? Just to make sure I didn't kill it with the first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does crack the skull and you watch as the sutures cave in from below, the light of your hammer still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it begins to lift up again, its mouth (cackling), you hit it with the side of the hammer, and it just scatters into broken bone chunks and shards that splatter against the wall and rattle down the grade a bit towards your direction as Kerrek turns around, looking back over his shoulder at you guys, the pathway now clear ahead of you.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: It's matter-of-fact, there was no serpentine, it was like-- and then it was just cutting wood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now walk carefully around the previously noticed patches of dirt and sand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I grab those immovable rods when we get out of there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. And as you pull them out, it seals the tunnel once more behind you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, do you have any more teleportations left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we see any trees? Everything was dead the closer we got to the central--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to get to a living tree that we can all fit through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, she goes, "I do have a teleportation circle, so I may be able to bring us to Emon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to go to Emon or anywhere else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can go to Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you get us to Greyskull Keep, or at least the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need something that'll get Scanlan. What's the quickest--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, that's where our chapel is in our house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike and I have a little temple, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's one of the few teleportation sigils that still exist, in that vicinity at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do it, do it. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She finishes, you watch the arcane flash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Kima's about to go behind her, and Kima goes, "I don't... it doesn't usually look like that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Allura didn't vanish, did she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was a weird sparkle of electrical energy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean, it doesn't look like that normally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. I don't know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we follow or do something else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody know what the fuck--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was that supposed to look like? What it was supposed to look like?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we do some sort of check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an arcana check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd love to make an arcana check.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: I'll roll the bones in case it's a religious thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, as perception thing, if we've seen a teleportation circle before, would we at least know that it doesn't look like it's supposed to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is pretty rapid. Let's see here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need those two, right, to do what we need to do. We have to go with them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can get us there via tree. If we need to. There's a tree in Sarenrae's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'd better be right. If we leave those two behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it only lasts for a round, so it's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we have to make this decision stat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But what if it took them somewhere--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's something-- you get the sense that there's something about this-- either this mountain or this underground area, there's something that has some sort of influence or impact on any sort of transportation magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who knows where they just got teleported to?

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Or if they ended up anywhere at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, the amount of talking we're doing, it's already closed at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go find a tree. We all start running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we find a tree, we find a tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We go to the beach and we find a tree. We get as far away from this cave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if-- where did they just go? What if we just sent them to some plane of existence?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try and scry on them and see, but that's going to take time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just start walking. Grog and I start walking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We start walking to the beach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I scry while we're walking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a piggyback from Grog and scry while we're walking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd give you a concentration check to maintain it for the duration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do it, let's do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a rest on the carpet and I'm going to fly the carpet while you do your thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax and I are still walking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to cast-- I haven't burned any fifth-level spells, I'm going to scry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike's going to cast healing on people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see. Seems like we know where--

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Whoever's low. I know some people are pretty low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys slowly make your way through the forest, avoiding the patches that you noticed before, the weird collapsing earth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just laying back on the carpet in a trust-state as they guide me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a constitution saving throw, Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But we'll figure this out. We'll figure this out." And they both begin swimming, looking at the direction of the sun and picking what looks to be a northern position. And then the scry--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see any land, is there an island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they are both just plopped somewhere in the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well no, we have the fucking magic carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That can't hold all of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to go to Whitestone now, we're not going to go to Greyskull, and we're going to get Gilmore's help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they're our friends, are we just going to leave them behind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to get Gilmore's help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean. Keyleth starts hyperventilating, panicking a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth. We need you right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're okay, right? Allura will figure it out, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She'll figure it out. She's so powerful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is taking everything to not stay here. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still moving towards the beach, looking for live trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A short time later, you eventually get close to the edge of the waterline, and you do find a handful of trees that appear to be alive enough and large enough to maintain one of your spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do a useless scan of the ocean out of desperation to see if I see anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true. It was a Gil dice, it was Gil's dice. You can see, you can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment, and you don't know if it's the sense of the scry spell and something about the arcane winds that blow through the ley lines of magic that traverse across Exandria, but something guides your attention that way, and you focus real hard, and you see just at the horizon what looks to be a very, very faint speck of movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off on the broom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if that's them, I think that's them!

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Kerrek puts his hand on her shoulder and says, "Oh, child."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the direction that she went.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could be something else, but it's something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going, I'm going. I went.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wind of the ocean air coming past your face, the salt and the briny spray of bits of reef and rock that surround the island--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to give Vex over the earpiece like a, Warmer, warmer, warmer, colder, a little-- ten degrees to your left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do look out and you see both Kima and Allura swimming through the ocean, exhausted and it looks like, based on both the heavy armor that Kima's wearing and their general physical state, they're both having a hard time treading water, and they're swimming in the wrong direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fly over them and just tell them, "Hang onto the broom!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you probably a good 15 or so minutes, and as the tension's going on you can see Allura getting more and more exhausted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep holding, we're almost there, darling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just keep saying, "Vex? Did you find them?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking the carpet that direction.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: If it's been this long, Kerrek has given The Talk, like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just crying in Kerrek's shoulder right now, just bawling my eyes out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm on the way with the carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I swear I saw them, I swear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now." And then her and Kima vanish in a puff of dark bluish energy and appear on the carpet next to you through dimension door.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: It's, he's giving you the wrong pep talk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god. So wait, maybe they were just dead and I saw their ghosts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have them! We have them!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? And I just cry harder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is also listening to that, sometimes you cannot get them back, while holding Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (wailing) Like little Dobby in Harry Potter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Waterlogged, Kima shakes it out, leaving this trail as her hair's all matted and into her face, and she just looks really pissed and is like, "Not a word." Allura's squeezing out the sides of her braids. "Well, now what?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's take a tree, shall we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's try. I think this definitely explains why so many folks who went to investigate this place never came back.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Are we as far away as we can be, like, we came in on a tree, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You came in on a tree, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't mean a lot, but yeah. We're as far as we can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A third layer splits, it's having to force its way through this tree, and finally it divides out and you can see the sunset-lit outside of the center of Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hold the door open like it's a closing elevator. Am I sure it's fucking Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all charge through, making your way through the portal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you see the faintly blossoming branches of the Sun Tree greeting you to the center of sunsetting Whitestone, together as a group, clutching Scanlan's lifeless body in your arms still, Vax. What do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cry to Kerr a little bit more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, should we get him to the castle or the Raven Queen's temple?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To the temple of the Raven Queen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, to the temple, to the temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I use my-- oh jeez. I can't remember-- no, I didn't use any of my Scrying Eye on Raishan at all, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was my spell just now. I will use my Scrying Eye now to see if I can find Kaylie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm already 50 feet towards the temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all make your way towards the temple of the Raven Queen and the graveyard outside of Whitestone. As you're making this scry attempt with the item, go ahead and make another concentration check as you're moving along and doing this on the carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a regular-- what do I use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, you have warcaster, so you technically have advantage on concentration, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly you feel your essence thrust downward through the clouds once more towards the closing daylight around Kymal in the center of Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking down to the rather dirty, destitute, gambling-overrun and light-law-enforced city that Kymal is, you're pulled once more into what looks to be a tavern room, and there you see a makeshift band of very terrible performers playing, and at the back table you see Kaylie with half a flagon of ale sitting there, dagger on the table, just staring and just giving those performers shit, she's like, "You all fucking suck, you know that?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I love her so much right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where I come from, they'd kill you for this. That's terrible. Certainly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Knowing how scrying works, and knowing that certain magic-casters can feel it-- This is going on a limb. I just yell through the scrying and audibly amongst everyone, "Kaylie! It's Scanlan!" Trying to push through the magical boundary and see if I can at least get a reaction out of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kaylie just keeps drinking from the flagon and is shouting out, someone comes by and you watch as she deftly nabs a little bit of coin from the pocket--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't seem to be having an effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God damn it, I wish you could talk to people through scrying sometimes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who can send me there? I'll go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, do you still have any messages left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get her and bring her here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we get the other gate stone and find Shaun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got the gate stone, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have both of them, we have them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we have the one gate stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, doesn't your sister have the other one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, find the other gate stone and find Shaun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Find the other gate stone. I take off to find Gilmore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will go get the other gate stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And in the meantime, take him to the Raven Queen temple.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Now, from what I know about the Raven Queen, she is not like, oh, you can get a do-over, right?

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: She is like, you are dead and that is the line you do not cross to not come back.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Yeah, but from what I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you know as Kerrek? Yeah, she's--

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: She's the one that fucking holds this line. Like, you do not come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's the mistress of fate, and if your destiny is cut short, there is exception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, her real loathing is for those people who go against that natural destiny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unnatural, unexpected death across one's fate line is unfortunate, but it can be corrected.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have teleportation? Do you have anything that can send me to Kymal. Kymal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bit dastardly for my tastes. I-- I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (tearfully) Do you know of a city nearby? Anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there's Westruun, but that sigil got destroyed too. What's wrong?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan's down. We have to find his daughter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just need to get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold on." And he leads you back up to the castle. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All this time, I have laid Scanlan down in the center of the temple, and with a wet rag I have cleaned his face and combed his hair out and laid Mythcarver out next to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably gave him some clean pants because he's covered in piss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you've got to scrub that down a little.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right? I can't go in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. I'm just me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, I don't know. Your will be done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it would mean something if you talked to him from beyond.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You knew him. Look inside and you will know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, I just start talking to him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I crack the door to the temple open and try and gesture him in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, in there. I'm not really religious, though, like. I don't--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know if Kaylie will make it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I go into the temple of the Raven Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you guys having Pike prepare the Resurrection ritual, is that what's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are talking to air right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I was talking to Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to put together the Resurrection ritual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wasn't expecting-- that wasn't part of the ritual.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: So everybody here is a mess, right? And when they brought them out of the ocean, Kerrek was like-- because that shook him, you know? Because he knew at this point, now is the point where all your friends die. But these guys I can't talk to, they are all messed-- how bad are you?

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Right. I get you a little aside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm probably coming back down now from the castle with the stone.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: What-- can his sister do something, or his daughter?

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Why-- why the urgency, I mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my thought. I've been there, I've experienced this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's where I'm putting my bets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura approaches and says, "If we can wait until tomorrow, I can take us there, but-- I just, I have no means of--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it's bad to wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jeez, I don't know his name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, as you're brought up to the castle, Gilmore is tugging your arm, and you see he has a haste to him, and he's like, "Where's Eskil? Where's Eskil? Has he returned? Please, somebody, give me this answer. Anyone." And you watch as some of the guards come up and like, "Eskil's been back in his research at the ziggurat for the better part of a week, now."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guards, you're with Gilmore, you will get him into any room in the castle immediately without question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This older hunched form. It looks like they finished their work for the day and, as you all begin rushing down the hall to the ziggurat beneath Whitestone, he says, "Oh, hello. We're finished, there's no reason to--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then can you send me to Kymal, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shaun--" Shaun kind of goes, "If you want to be of use to anybody right now, buddy, this is the way to do it." (sputters) "Kymal. All right. Heh, that's a one- way trip, so you're paying for room and board."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Sure." I give Shaun a kiss on the cheek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Have you guys caught up at this point?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at the temple, I've sent them off to deal with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So we go-- what are you looking for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking for a tavern, probably the only one in town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kymal is, and you've passed through before. Kymal is-- it's the real-- it's the seedy Reno of Tal'Dorei, if you will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, Reno's already pretty seedy, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not Laughlin level. It's not-- sorry, Laughlin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just terrified of all my dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, but I didn't add anything to that. Investigation... that's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a terrible off-key band in the corner of four people, three gentlemen and a lady--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there you see, half-slumped over in the corner at the table, you see Kaylie, just ready to pass out at the end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. Stay by the bar. I'll be right back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One room-- two rooms, she's paying, hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he walks over towards the bar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's going to be so pissed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah he is, he's going to be so pissed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the way to do this. Okay, byeeee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want from me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I smack her across the cheek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You--" She grabs the dagger and grabs you by the front of the shirt and brings it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't want to deal with him right now. Tell him-- look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Kaylie!" And I pick her up and bring her up to my eye-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will kick your ass right now if you keep treating me like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there's a chance we can bring him back, if you're willing to help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Defending everyone. Saving the fucking land, can you believe it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who would want a death like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He died with piss all over him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you can find it in yourself to forgive him, you'll live a much happier life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At the very least, I'd like to see his body before it's interred."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll bring you to him, I swear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) So much strangeness surrounds you folks every time I cross paths with you, it seems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think we will pick this up right there next week here in Whitestone for the ritual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All night long, man, all night long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm trying to push the narrative as long as I can get, trying to get to a point, but yeah, this is building and I don't want to drag us in here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gah, it's going to be another Percy situation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan's going to be dead for a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't force narrative. All right, well, we will pick this up next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ironically of course, also, I don't think we have Sam next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's going to be interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Push the narrative all night long like Lionel Ritchie, come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we wait, he's going to write us off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hear him! I hear him from beyond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know he's gone. Like a tool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, maybe he can Skype in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can totally, like Zod in the mirror.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. All right, well. With that, the Conclave lies destroyed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a surprisingly low-level paladin getting the final blow on an ancient green dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way to David that goliath, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, legit, we were all talking, we thought you were going to die.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Why do you think I showed up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were like, I wonder if he's going to totally Coulson, I wonder if he's just going to Coulson on us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We thought you were going to be our Agent Coulson, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I honestly prepared that to be this-- like, we talked about that on the break, it would've been an awesome heroic end to the story.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: That's why I was here. I was going to throw my body in front of someone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just happened to work out that she was pinned straight to the side--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you didn't do a very good job of it, Patrick.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Oh, believe me, Kerrek much would've rather died than have this particular outcome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shoot for the moon, sometimes you'll land at the how do you want to do this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, Feeblemind? Natural 20 on scanning the ocean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had a few lucky rolls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth and Kerr MVPs for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somebody conquered some personal demons, this week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was waiting for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're still an awkward mess, but you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As much character growth as you can have, you're still always you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will always be a pit of fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She will always be awkward. I will always trip and fall and faceplant in lava.
